## usePrevious() function

Get value from previous render

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function usePrevious<T>(value: T): T | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | current value |

<b>Returns:</b>

T \| undefined

value from previous render
